choose.when:
<set-variable name="safetyTotalSeverity" value="@{
                    int totalSeverity = 0;
                    JArray categoriesAnalysis = (JArray)((IResponse)context.Variables["safetyResponse"]).Body.As(preserveContent: true)["categoriesAnalysis"];
                    foreach (var item in categoriesAnalysis)
                    {
                        totalSeverity += (int)item["severity"];
                    }
                    return totalSeverity;
                }" />
                
                    
                        
                            
                            @{ 
                                var errorResponse = new
                                {
                                    error = new
                                    {
                                        message = "The content was filtered by the Azure AI Content Safety service. Total severity:" + (int)context.Variables["safetyTotalSeverity"]
                                    }
                                };                            
                                return JsonConvert.SerializeObject(errorResponse);
                            }
